name: Drag & Lolipop
description:
Drag & Lolipop is a puzzle platformer about moving objects using the mouse to make the way for your pink (red) panda.
The art uses the Mulfok32 Palette from Lospec.
This was made for Mini Jam 104 in 72 hours, and all assets were made during that timeframe (art, code, sound, music) by me.

Controls

A/D to move
Space to jump
Click to pick up object
Move Mouse to move picked up object
